Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Greatsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Slaad makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws or Greatsword

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Slaad can cast a few spells innately
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Weapons, The Slaad's weapons attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 5: Regeneration, The Slaad regains HP at the start of its turn
